Attribute (parameters format : [{name: "name", operator: "contain", value: "test"}] )
Possible values for operator are contain, notContain, exist, notExist, ==, !=, valid, invalid

}

allowed count: 1-3

body text: 1024
footer text: 60
button's text: 20
